title: Care Partners
content:
Your partnership has the power to transform the lives of the some of the most vulnerable members of society, while also meeting your corporate social responsibility objectives and engaging your staff. We honor our Care Partner’s donation by recognizing your partnership through Portland Rescue Mission’s marketing channels as well as provide you with a branded marketing tool kit that you can use to spread the word to your friends, family and customers.

Choose the package:

Own the Day - $1,881

Own the Day + Night - $3477

Restart Life - $11,676

Restore Life - 6 months $14,000

Restore Life - 12 months $28,000

Other Amount - $XXX
